#summary The screen.pixelDepth property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property

== Values ==

The `screen.pixelDepth` property returns an integer.

This property is identical to [ScreenColorDepthProperty screen.colorDepth] except it doesn't work in [BrowserFamilyMSIE Internet Explorer].

This property is read-only.

== Usage ==

Don't use this property; use [ScreenColorDepthProperty screen.colorDepth] instead.
